plot: A filmmaker and his son journey to the other side of the world in search of understanding one of the most mysterious places on earth.
title: The Sojourners
plot_es: A filmmaker and his son journey to the other side of the world in search of understanding one of the most mysterious places on earth.
plot_en: A filmmaker and his son journey to the other side of the world in search of understanding one of the most mysterious places on earth.
